mapper.insert: insert into review(num, writer, title, subtitle, description, netflix, watcha, wavve, laftel, kakao, coupang, naver) values(review_seq.NEXTVAL,#{writer},#{title},#{subtitle},#{description},#{netflix}, #{watcha},#{wavve},#{laftel},#{kakao},#{coupang},#{naver})
mapper.select: select * from review order by likes desc
select * from review order by writetime desc
